text:
M. S. NOVIK
/
500 WEST 23rd STREET • SUITE 1200 • NEW YORK 11, N. Y. • ALGONQUIN 5-4585
RADIO
CONSULTANT
July 31, 1956
Mr. Harry J. Skomia, Executive Director
National Association of Educational
Broadcasters
lh Gregory Hall
Urbana, Ill.
My dear Harxy:
My secretary just read to me your letter of
the 30th. I am not in town - staying at Long
Beach to get some sleep.
I will try to do it Wednesday or Thursday.
The chances are it will be Thursday.
It would help me if you could give me an outline
of what you want — how much different than the
last statement I submitted. It would be no
problem at all normally, but now it is. If need
be, call on the telephone ^collect** on Wednesday
and give it to Alice, my secretary, after you
receive this letter.
Sincerely,
M. S. Novik
MSNifau
